text: Maureen Morfydd Colquhoun ( ; (12 August 1928 – 2 February 2021) was a British economist and Labour Party politician. She was born in London. She was a Member of parliament from 1974 to 1979. Colquhoun was Britain's first openly lesbian MP. Colquhoun died on 2 February 2021, aged 92.Maureen Colquhoun: Tributes paid to first openly lesbian MP ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Lesbians Category:British economists Category:British LGBT politicians Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:UK MPs 1974 Category:Politicians from London Category:Writers from London
title: Maureen Colquhoun
